Package by.bsuir.mycoolsite.service

Interface FilmService

All Known Implementing Classes:
FilmServiceImpl
public interface FilmService
Service interface for managing film-related operations. Implementations of this interface should provide methods for retrieving a list of films, getting a film by its ID, adding a new film, and editing existing film details.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addNewFilm(Film film)
    Adds a new film to the database.
    void
    editFilm(Film film)
    Edits the details of an existing film.
    Film
    getFilmById(long id)
    Retrieves a specific film by its ID.
    List<Film>
    getFilms()
    Retrieves a list of all films.

  • Method Details

    • getFilms

      List<Film> getFilms() throws ServiceException
      Retrieves a list of all films.
      Returns:
      a List of Film objects representing all films
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if an issue occurs during the service operation

    • getFilmById

      Film getFilmById(long id) throws ServiceException
      Retrieves a specific film by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the film
      Returns:
      the Film object representing the specified film
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if an issue occurs during the service operation

    • addNewFilm

      void addNewFilm(Film film) throws ServiceException
      Adds a new film to the database.
      Parameters:
      film - the Film object containing the details of the new film
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if an issue occurs during the service operation

    • editFilm

      void editFilm(Film film) throws ServiceException
      Edits the details of an existing film.
      Parameters:
      film - the Film object containing the updated details
      Throws:
      ServiceException - if an issue occurs during the service operation
